thread.title: Brussels Airlines to launch Belfast route
thread.title_full: Brussels Airlines to launch Belfast route

title: Brussels Airlines to launch Belfast route
text:
0 comments Tom Newcombe Thu, 22 Oct 2015 09:18 Follow @thomasnewcombe Brussels Airlines has announced a year-round service to Belfast starting next summer.
The carrier will roster an Avro RJ100 five-times weekly between Brussels and Belfast City from March 27.
On Thursdays, outbound service SN2151 will depart Brussels at 1430 and arrive in Belfast at 1515. Return leg SN2152 will leave Belfast at 1550 and land in Brussels at 1835.
On Mondays, Wednesdays, Fridays and Sundays, outbound service SN2151 will depart Brussels at 1530 and arrive in Belfast at 1615. Return leg SN2152 will leave Belfast at 1650 and land in Brussels at 1935.
Earlier this week , the airline unveiled its new frequent flyer programme called Loop.
